General.Name: Ditas Dogan Yedek Parca Imalat ve Teknik AS
General.Description: Ditas Dogan Yedek Parça Imalat ve Teknik A.S. manufactures and sells vehicle steering and suspension parts to vehicle manufacturers in Turkey and internationally. It offers rod ends, tie rods, torque and V-torque rods, idler arms, axial joints, pitman arms, drag links, ball joints, track control arms, and stabilizer links. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Nigde, Turkey. Ditas Dogan Yedek Parça Imalat ve Teknik A.S. is a subsidiary of Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S.
